description:
> ==> Compiled Paralympics data over the years : [60 years of Paralympics](https://www.kaggle.com/shivagovindasamy/60-years-of-paralympics) # Information *** This a collection of data from the Tokyo Paralympics Games 2020 held at Tokyo, Japan during 24-Aug-2021 to 5-Sep-2021. 4426 Athletes, 212 Teams from 162 Countries/NPCs participated and competed against each other. # Dataset Description *** Each dataset file describes: + `NPCs-list.csv` : National Paralympic Committee's (NPCs) names and their corresponding short codes + `entries-by-discipline.csv`: Different Sporting events at the Paralympics and their participant's gender counts + `paralympic-athletes.csv` : List of participating athletes at the Tokyo Paralympics , their representing country and their sport + `paralympic-coaches.csv` : List of Coaches of the participating teams (Team Sports only) + `paralympic-medal-tally.csv` : Final Medal Tally of the Participating Countries/NPCs + `paralympic-medals.csv` : List of Winning Athlete's/Team's details + `paralympic-teams.csv` : List of participating Teams of different sports ## Acknowledgement *** **The data was collected from the [Official Tokyo Paralympics Website](https://olympics.com/tokyo-2020/en/paralympics/)**

### **Versions** + `V2`: Updated `paralympic-athletes.csv` with Athlete's date of birth, Gender and Age. + `V3`: Removed **Age** column, since it can get obsolete.
title: 2020 Tokyo Paralympics
